alert.note: Alert for Adams; Spokane; Whitman (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 11:44PM PDT until July 13 at 12:30AM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: The National Weather Service in Spokane has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Adams County in eastern Washington... Northeastern Whitman County in eastern Washington... South central Spokane County in northeastern Washington... * Until 1230 AM PDT. * At 1144 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 17 miles west of Colfax, or 30 miles northwest of Pullman, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Rosalia, St. John, Oakesdale, Endicott, Malden, Thornton, Pine City, Winona, Ewen and Ewan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Spokane.
